scripts.report:build:prod: node git-version-gen.js && ng build InspectionReport-Public -c production

scripts.report-internal:build:staging: node git-version-gen.js && ng build InspectionReport-Internal -c staging
scripts.report-internal:build:prod: node git-version-gen.js && ng build InspectionReport-Internal -c production
